DOC.brief_title: rhBMP-2/CRM/CD HORIZON® Spinal System Pivotal Study
DOC.detailed_description: This clinical trial conduct evaluate rhBMP-2/CRM/CD HORIZON® Spinal System posterolateral fusion treatment patient symptomatic degenerative disc disease versus control group autogenous bone CD HORIZON® Spinal System . The investigational treatment open bilateral posterolateral implantation rhBMP-2/CRM/CD HORIZON® Spinal System . One investigational implant place across two adjacent transverse process side spine spinal fusion procedure . The control treatment bilateral posterolateral implantation autogenous bone harvest iliac crest CD HORIZON® Spinal System .
